alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:02AM MST until February 16 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Period of Snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph from Red Canyon to South Pass. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery to snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes Wednesday across South Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
